class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        same = []
        n = len(nums)
        oneSteps = [0]*(k+2)
        for i in range(n//2):
            a = nums[i]
            b = nums[n-i-1]
            diff = abs(a-b)
            same.append(diff)
            oneStep = max(a,b,k-a,k-b)
            oneSteps[oneStep+1] +=1
        
        times = [n//2]*(k+1)
        add = 0
        for i in range(k+1):
            add += oneSteps[i]
            times[i]+=add
        for num in same:
            times[num]-=1
        #print(oneSteps,same,times)
        return min(times)

        return 0
